rows.label: qev051501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh ho! A single glance tells me that you are no
common fighter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0002
rows.name:
What a marvel, this city! Warriors fit to rival the
Wrothian greats walk its every street![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0003
rows.name:
I assume you have come to participate in the
Wrothian Battle Gauntlet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask to hear more about the Gauntlet.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0020
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0021
rows.name: Give an unquestioning nod.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0004
rows.name:
It is among my kingdom's oldest traditions—a contest
of martial arts to decide the greatest living warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Alas, with the kingdom's decline into poverty and our
subjugation by the Ganglion, it has gone forgotten for
many long years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0006
rows.name:
But no longer! I, Zo Ozuchi, did not forget,
and now I have sent out a call to all warriors.
The time has nearly come![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0007
rows.name:
And this promises to be the most exciting gauntlet yet,
for it is not just Wrothians competing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0008
rows.name:
And what of you? With the Ganglion forces toppled,
I would expect you are frustrated for lack of a worthy
outlet for your strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0009
rows.name:
Why not participate, then? I assure you it will be an
experience the likes of which you have never imagined![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Such intrepid spirit! But know that this is a tournament
to decide Mira's greatest warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0011
rows.name:
Though the contest itself is a Wrothian tradition,
this time combatants of all races will participate.
It will be the fiercest gauntlet ever fought![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Even a veteran warrior such as yourself could be
injured...or worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0013
rows.name: Well? Are you prepared to risk your life for glory?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Not a moment's hesitation. Ah, the Gauntlet always
brings in brave fools like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0015
rows.name:
And it was ever the bravest and most foolhardy that
became its champions![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0016
rows.name:
So be it, then. Go and prepare for combat!
I shall see to preparing the matchups in the meantime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0017
rows.name:
Greetings, warrior. Every matchup save for yours has
been decided.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0018
rows.name:
I am impressed. The participants this time around are
truly formidable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0019
rows.name:
I had thought there would be few outsiders able to
match a Wrothian in combat...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0020
rows.name:
But I now see that space is a vast place full of
surprising people. This will be a tournament to
remember for all time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0021
rows.name: So then, are you ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0030
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you need more time to prepare.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0040
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0041
rows.name: Nod resolutely.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Come in your very best condition—this is an arena for
only the most finely-honed of warriors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0023
rows.name:
Even one with your skill and experience could fall prey
to their might if you are not careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0024
rows.name:
Your first opponent will be the princess of the respected
House of Zo—a woman fit to match swords with any
challenger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0025
rows.name:
I take it the two of you know each other?
Her eyes lit up when I told her she would face you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0026
rows.name:
I won't ask what has transpired between you.
Watching the fight will tell me all I need to know![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0027
rows.name:
Warriors of your caliber speak more eloquently with
blades than words could ever hope to rival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0028
rows.name: You have tamed the wild princess! I am impressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0029
rows.name:
I knew you were something special, but that fight...
Ha ha! I look forward to your next match.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0030
rows.name:
Well? Your opponent is ready and waiting.
If you are prepared, the fight can begin at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0050
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that you need more time to prepare.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0060
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0061
rows.name: Nod without hesitation.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0031
rows.name:
Fair enough! Go make your preparations.
I am certain the show will be worth the wait.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0032
rows.name:
Your next opponent is...a Nopon.
And before you say anything, let me explain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0033
rows.name:
I have granted her one very small exception in terms
of the rules of engagement...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0034
rows.name:
Think of it as a new test of might and skill,
one unique to the tournament here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0035
rows.name:
Now go show the people what you are made of.
Show them the essence of a true warrior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0036
rows.name:
A marvelous battle! You carved through that pack of
beasts like they were mere flies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0037
rows.name: Again you prove that I was right to invite you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0070
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask about your next opponent.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0080
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Zo Ozuchi that your victory was inevitable.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0038
rows.name:
Gathering intelligence already, perchance?
Ha! Quite the shrewd warrior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0039
rows.name:
The true test will be whether you can maintain that
bravado while facing your next opponent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0040
rows.name:
Your next challenge is a Prone. Their kind are united in
their terrible strength, but this Cavern Clan warrior is
especially fearsome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0041
rows.name:
Even with your abilities, this will not be a challenge
easily surmounted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0042
rows.name:
Are you up to it? I warn you again—approach this
fight lightly, and you shall be devoured.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0090
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0091
rows.name: Say that you need more time to prepare.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0100
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0101
rows.name: Nod resolutely.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0043
rows.name:
There is time yet before the next match.
Use it wisely to ready yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0044
rows.name:
This tournament has been held by my people since
antiquity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0045
rows.name:
At times, visitors from other worlds participated,
but most were no match for Wrothian warriors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0046
rows.name:
However, your next foe—a Prone—made sport of our
finest, winning her way to this round without so much
as a scratch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0047
rows.name:
Fighters of this caliber are rare indeed. I am confident
that your match will make for an electrifying show.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0048
rows.name:
...Your opponent will be here shortly.
Make this a battle to remember![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0049
rows.name:
You two fought with the grim resolve of wild animals,
pressing on through pain and injury by instinct and
force of will alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0050
rows.name:
You and Slovity both fought with every fiber of your
being![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0051
rows.name:
Your next match awaits, and the opponent stands at
the ready. Do you require rest after such an intense
round?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0110
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0111
rows.name: Say that you'll rest for a bit.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0120
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0121
rows.name: Tell Zo Ozuchi that you are ready now.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0052
rows.name: Understood! Then go patch your wounds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0053
rows.name:
Once you are prepared, come let me know.
I eagerly await the next spectacle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0054
rows.name:
You seem more eager than ever, but know this:
The next match pits you against a fellow human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0055
rows.name:
Your foe has advanced this far with a BLADE-like show
of precision and combat expertise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0056
rows.name:
Though while they are clearly human, I cannot help
but sense a...different energy within.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0057
rows.name:
It seems a force entirely unlike your own,
or even that of others who come from Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0058
rows.name:
Well enough. As the old Wrothian saying goes,
combat speaks the truth of a thousand words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0059
rows.name:
All shall be revealed in the course of the match,
of that I am sure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0060
rows.name: Your opponent was a Definian![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0061
rows.name:
Ho ho! And who are you, that you have had cause to
cross paths with their kind?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0130
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0131
rows.name: Tell Zo Ozuchi of your connection to the Definians.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0140
rows.name: Withhold

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0141
rows.name: Keep your connection to the Definians secret.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0062
rows.name:
Simply fascinating. So you are the one responsible
for their destruction?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0063
rows.name:
I suppose great warriors and great deeds always go
hand in hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0064
rows.name:
Ho ho, how mysterious! But very well.
A warrior's past is of no matter here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0065
rows.name: Only strength matters in the Gauntlet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0066
rows.name:
Now then, are you ready to face your next match?
The crowds are eager to be wowed once more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0150
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0151
rows.name: Say that you need to cool down first.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0160
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0161
rows.name:
Say that you'll use your momentum to crush the next
opponent.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0067
rows.name:
Quite understandable.
Keeping a cool head in battle is crucial.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0068
rows.name:
Once you feel calmed enough, speak with me.
Your opponent will be ready and waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0069
rows.name: Hah! Hot-blooded, as any good warrior must be![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0070
rows.name:
The one you will face next is quite the opposite,
though. A strange case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0071
rows.name:
Not cold-blooded, so much as...no-blooded?
Suffice it to say, this will not be a simple match.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0072
rows.name:
It may be quite different than those you have fought
before, but I trust your strength and resolve will see
you through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0073
rows.name: Were you surprised when an automaton turned up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0074
rows.name:
Quite the story, that. I allowed it to enter because I was
certain no Wrothian would ever lose to a machine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0075
rows.name:
Several Wrothians proved me wrong. Embarrassed as I
am to admit it, I was beginning to fear that contraption
might go all the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0076
rows.name:
I will concede that the technology of the Orpheans and
Ma-non is quite exceptional.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0077
rows.name:
And yet you managed to overpower it nonetheless.
You are every bit the powerhouse he said you were![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0078
rows.name: The semifinals are next! Are you ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0170
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0171
rows.name: Ask who "he" is.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0180
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0181
rows.name: Say that you were born ready.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0190
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0191
rows.name: Request time to prepare.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0079
rows.name:
If you are curious, prepare for the next round!
Once the fight begins, you will have your answer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0080
rows.name: Heh. He was quite eager to settle a score with you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0081
rows.name:
Very good! The Wrothian Battle Gauntlet is coming to
its grand climax![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0082
rows.name:
Who will inherit the title of grand champion?
...You? Or the old man's grandson?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0083
rows.name: I will be proud to bear witness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0084
rows.name:
The semifinals are set to begin. Dig deep and tap into
whatever stores of strength you have![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0085
rows.name: Understood. Do what you must.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0086
rows.name:
Your next opponent has been chomping at the bit for a
while now. So tarry not![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0088
rows.name:
From the moment I first saw you, I had a feeling you
would make it this far. A vague hunch, but undeniable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0089
rows.name:
At this point in the competition, there is no room for
hesitation. Show us everything you have![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0200
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0201
rows.name: Ask for time to prepare for the final round.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0210
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0211
rows.name: Say that you're ready to end this.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0090
rows.name:
If your current condition is not your best,
that is formidable indeed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0091
rows.name:
But my eagerness to see what new potential you hold
outweighs my impatience. Go prepare as you will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0092
rows.name: Wonderful. Your last foe should be here presently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0093
rows.name:
Cast any lingering doubts aside and show me a
strength that surpasses all limitations![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0094
rows.name:
I had heard Zang's stories, but by the heavens!
You are simply amazing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0095
rows.name:
I have not fought such a heated match since I faced his
grandfather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0096
rows.name:
Ah, you have brought back a flood of memories...
Days of risking my life in the pursuit of pure strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0220
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0221
rows.name: Pay homage to Zo Ozuchi's abilities.

rows.label: qev051501_JNK0230
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev051501_SEL0231
rows.name:
Tell Zo Ozuchi that you have only
begun to tap your potential.

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0097
rows.name:
Strength, humility, AND kindness! The opportunity to
face you in battle is an honor I will treasure always.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0098
rows.name: You are indeed a bottomless well of power![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0099
rows.name:
I congratulate you as champion of the Wrothian Battle
Gauntlet, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0100
rows.name:
From this day forth, all will hail you as the strongest
warrior in the land! And as for myself...
Well, it seems I have some training to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0101
rows.name:
I will whip this rusty body back into shape and return
to challenge you another day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0102
rows.name:
Just be sure to hold the title until the next tournament.
I'll not have you losing before I can reclaim what is
rightfully mine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0103
rows.name: Until then, be well, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0104
rows.name: What is this? Are your nerves besting you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051501_MSG0105
rows.name:
Your opponent awaits! Go now!
Show them all that you have![ST:wait ]
